title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 300.1 - Deputation to act as authorizing official
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 300.1 - Deputation to act as authorizing official

State Regulations
(a) Form and content. Deputations to sign
public assistance, care, and services authorizations shall contain: (1)
name, title and signature of person
deputized; (2)
categories of public
assistance, care, or services which he may authorize; (3)
effective date of deputation; and
(4)
signature and title of
deputizing social services official. (b) Filing of deputations. For the purpose of
establishing the validity of signatures on authorizations or orders, in
connection with field audit, each social services official shall maintain a
file of all approved deputations. Such file shall be available to local or

State fiscal authorities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
300.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
